name: Smut Dungeons: Captain's Orders Bundle
description:
The Smut Dungeons Captain's Orders Bundle is a collection of erotic fantasy text adventures containing interactive love-making scenes.
These interactive text sext adventures are for ADULTS ONLY (18+). Try not to rip your dick off.
The Adventures:
Farthest Depths: Your crew has been assigned to probe the farthest depths of space. But when a bunch of horny men and women are stuck together on a space ship millions of lightyears away from Earth, things are bound to get freaky.
Eruption on Uranus: You have crash landed on Uranus! The volcanoes in the planet's surface are erupting, and you have nowhere left to run. This may very well be your last night in this universe. Better not waste it!
Rings of the Moon: You have been reassigned to the most boring job in the galaxy: working on the moon base. If you don't find some way to entertain yourself, you'll probably die of boredom. Luckily, the base is filled with hunky dudes looking for some action.
Play more Smut Dungeons here.
